lease_disclaimer: Lease this 2025 Honda HR-V AWD LX VIN 3CZRZ2H31SM755532 for $311.90 per month for 36 months for a total of payments of $11,228.40, a security deposit of $0.00 and a total due at signing of $3,136.90.  Lessee responsible for maintenance, repairs, excessive wear and tear, and excess mileage over 10000 miles/year at the rate of $0.00/mile. Option to purchase vehicle at lease end for $0.00 plus the residual value of $18,080.00.  Early lease termination fee may apply. This offer requires Excellent Tier 1 credit (770+); not all applicants will qualify.  This program is offered through Honda Financial Services and expires on 03/03/2025.  Offers cannot be combined with any other advertised offer.  See dealer for details.
finance_disclaimer: Available on approved credit through Honda Financial Services, 3.9 APR for up to 48 months on select new and unregistered 2025 Honda HR-V models through 2025-03-03, for well-qualified buyers. $22.53 per Month per $1,000 Financed financed. Not all buyers will qualify. Higher financing rates apply for buyers with lower credit ratings. Actual down payment may vary. Dealer participation may affect actual payment. Dealer sets actual prices. See participating dealers for details.
